message: Take it or leave it, Bob!
I think it's fair to split the money evenly, considering the inflation. Let's be reasonable.
Not quite fair, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need more than 40%.
Meet me halfway, Bob. I'm willing to give you a bit more.
Let's be reasonable and split it closer to 50/50. We both lose money if we keep rejecting offers.
Not quite there, Bob. I need a bit more to make it worth my while.
Getting closer, Bob. Meet me at 57.5/42.5 and let's wrap this up.
We're running out of time, Alice. Let's just split it evenly and call it a day.
